title: Narrative expression as meaning-making and connection

description: Discover how creative writing transforms personal experience into universal connection through the power of narrative, imagery, and authentic expression

core_principle_translations.en: Stories and language create understanding, preserve culture, and build empathy across all human experiences

core_principle_translations.fr: Les histoires et le langage créent de la compréhension, préservent la culture et développent l'empathie à travers toutes les expériences humaines
